text: The 1928 Argentine Primera División was the 37th season of top-flight football in Argentina. The season began on April 15, 1928, and ended on June 30, 1929. The league expanded to include 36 teams, which played in a single league with each team playing the other only once. Huracán won its 4th. title in Primera. El Porvenir and Argentino de Banfield returned to the top division after their runs on Segunda División while Liberal Argentino and Porteño were relegated.Argentina 1928 at RSSSF ==Final table== ==References== Category:Argentine Primera División seasons Category:1928 in Argentine football Category:1928 in South American football
title: 1928 Argentine Primera División
